original_text:
and for the land of my people,
    a land overgrown with thorns and briers—
yes, mourn for all houses of merriment
    and for this city of revelry.
korean_text: 내 백성의 땅에 가시와 찔레가 나며 희락의 성읍, 기뻐하는 모든 집에 나리니

sentences.original_text: and for the land of my people
a land overgrown with thorns and briers
yes, mourn for all houses of merriment
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇소, 모든 즐거운 집들을 위해 슬퍼하라

sentences.original_text: and for this city of revelry
